1.content: Right, here's how it starts: Pick an animal and start a story. It'll grow from there on out.
1.title: Animal pick

choices: You go and talk to Karl
You find some zebras to talk to
You wander around the plains looking for someone
11.content:
Your name is Samster and you are a rare, black and green rhinoceros (how cool is that)? You live in the plains of some beautiful country, presumably Africa, where various adventures take place everyday. You were just like any other normal rhino, fat and happy and running around with a gigantic horn on your nostrils. No one ever bothered messing with you; just the horn itself was screaming "Don't fuck with me!" You even had a few friends, like Karl and Daisy (who was your girlfriend). In fact right now, you had your bodacious dick jammed into her ass. It was the middle of the night and you were humping the living daylights out of your woman, like there was no tomorrow. You loved your girlfriend and what better way to show that than having vigorous butt sex?
"Yes, yes, yes!!"
"Yeah, you like that don't you bitch?"
"Wait, what'd you call me?!"
"I mean that in a good way!! Come on, you know I love you!"
"True. Continue!"
And so, you resumed having sex for several more minutes. But eventually, you encountered a problem. While you were having sex, you released a wicked fart that almost blew your tail off.
"Uh-oh." you say meekly.
Afterwards, you farted again and a tiny bit of poop fell out. The smell was deadly and stinky and you quickly slide your penis out of your girlfriend's butt.
"What the fuck was that?!"
"Um...I farted." you say meekly.
"AGAIN?!!? God, I am so sick of you and your butt!"
"Bet you're not sick of my cock though aren't you?" you say while smiling in a lustful way.
"This is a serious problem Samster! I'm getting sick and tired of waking up to your stinky rhino farts! I'm going back home Samster!"
"But we were having sex!!"
"I don't care! I'll come back when you get your gas situation handled!"
Daisy walked away from you, leaving you to sit down and groan depressingly.

The next morning, you conspire up a plan.
"Maybe I should ask around to see how I can get rid of my gas expulsions..."
11.title: The Wrong Time...

choices: Look for female elephants to seduce
Poop near and/or on the tourists
12.content:
In the jungles of India, five grey elephants were giving tourists rides through the jungle on their backs. Their names were Tran, Kyle, Davis, Snorty, and Harwin. Tran was the leading elephant, Davis was at the end, Snorty was behind Tran, Harwin was behind Snorty, and lastly, Kyle was in front of Davis. So far, things were not going well...mostly for Snorty; a kid was repeatedly bashing him in the back with a stick in some sort of playful manner.
"I swear to God, if this kid doesn't stop banging on my back, I'm gonna stab him with my tusks!" shouted Snorty.
"Chill out Snorty! Only 40 miles to go before our rest stop." said Harwin.
"Dude, this is so stupid! Why the fuck do we keep giving these humans rides through the jungle?"
"Because we get rewarded with green bananas, and I LOVE eating green bananas!" said Davis.
"Fuck bananas. They're good an' all, but they give me gas." said Tran.
All of the elephants groaned.
"Don't even get us started Tran! Remember when we were taking mud baths and you just waltz in and just blow this shitty fart? That stunk like crazy man!" said Harwin.
"All right! You don't need to rub it in!"
"Maybe we should just keep walking until we arrive to the rest area." suggested Kyle.
"Okay."

About an hour later, the elephants started encountering problems again.
"Damnit!"
"What is it Snorty?"
Snorty groaned and started wiggling his butt like crazy.
"There's ants up my butthole. Can you dig 'em out for me with your trunk?"
Harwin groaned loudly. "Noooooo. There's no way in hell I'm putting my nose anywhere near your butt again. Last time, you kept farting on me until I passed out!"
"Just rub your ass on the grass like dogs do. That always works for me." said Kyle.
"Yeah, but my butt's still gonna itch, and Harwin has been staring at my butt for the past two hours; he might as well try and scratch my butt."
"I'm not digging my nose up your ass Snorty!"
"Fine! I've been having stomach problems anyways so..."
Snorty's stomach growled deeply and he sighed contently.
"You alright Snorty?" asked Tran.
"Yeah...just give me a couple of minutes..."
Snorty began to wiggle his butt again as they group continued to walk deeper into the forest.
"Here it comes!!"
"What?"
Snorty blasted a stinky wet fart that sounded like very loud bubbles right into Harwin's face, causing him and the tourists behind him to groan loudly with disgust.
"EW! Damnit Snorty, stop eating so many peanuts!"
"Did Snorty just fart again?! I can smell that shit all the way back here!" moaned Davis.
"Don't worry! I got more in store for you!"
Snorty blasted another, not so audible bubbly fart in the elephants' faces once again.
"PHEW!! Do you have to take a shit Snorty?!" asked Harwin.
"Probably. But hey, least those ants are gone!"
"Where'd they go?" asked Kyle.
"Knowing Snorty, his stinky farts killed them all." joked Tran.
"Shut up!"

After another 30 miles, the elephants arrived at the resting grounds, stretching themselves and trying to get comfortable.
"So...what should we do now?" asked Harwin.
"Kill the tourists?" asked Snorty.
"No, let's go look for some female elephants. I hear it's mating season in these parts!"
"Really...? Well, you know, we could gross out the tourists so they'll leave us alone for now."
After thinking long and hard, the elephants decided to...
12.title: Itch a Scratch, Scratch a Fart

choices: Find other animals to talk to
122.content:
eat exotic fruits and blow elephant gas around the tourists.
"Heh heh! Let's go eat some guava and bananas and go come back here. I wonder what'll happen when we stick our butts in their faces and pass gas!" said Harwin, excitedly.
"YES!! I'm so sick of this kid hitting me in the back!"
All of the elephants waited for the humans to get off before they began to traverse around the jungle, eating several different types of fruits and vegetables. Of course, Snorty went overboard and started eating really hot spicy red peppers that caused him to have spicy hot airy farts.
"Not so much Snorty! Last time, I had to blow water up your butt to cool you off!" said Kyle.
"Don't worry! I'll be careful!"

After eating for about 10 minutes, the elephants were starting to digest and waited about another hour or two before their bowels started to act up. Tran's was the first to gurgle.
"Uh-oh! Here it comes!"
The elephants all looked at each other and chuckled mischievously.
"Watch how the pro does it. You gotta act natural otherwise, they'll know you're fucking with them."
Tran slowly walked behind a tourist and began to walk in front of him. Then he sighed heavily and blasted several bubbly elephants right next to the tourist like it was nothing.
"Nice one Tran!" complemented Harwin.
"Smells like shit! Let me try it!" said Kyle.
Kyle walked in front of two kids with cameras and made sure they were positioned right behind his butt. Then he lifted his trunk and got a couple of leaves off the trees, which was when he blew his fart at the kids.
"EW!! Daddy! The elephant farted on us!" whined a little girl.
All the elephants laughed hysterically and waited for Snorty to pop in.
"Silent but deadly bitches!"
"What?" asked Harwin.
Snorty simply sat down and waited for the gas to excrete from his anus.
"OOH! That was a hot one! Whew, really stinky too!"
"What was...AW MAN!! That's burning my nose Snorty! Who farts like that?!!" said Davis.
"A master, that's who!"
Many of the tourists were already running away and were holding their nose, trying to waft the smell away. Harwin and Davis walked in front of the fleeing tourists and blocked their path with their massive asses. Everytime they tried to walk around, they'd just block 'em again.
"Here it comes!"
Davis and Harwin squatted and waved their tails back and forth, just in time to blast a loud stinky fart that sounded like a balloon releasing air into a can. It lasted for three seconds and sounded really wet. The tourists, fed up with the stink, began to run away.
"That's right assholes! You better run!" said Davis.
"That was so awesome man! What should we do now?" asked Snorty.
122.title: Gassy Bowel Contents

123.content:
"I gotta funny idea," Said Tran, "What is the one thing worse than our gas?"
The other four elephants shrugged, not knowing.
"Sheesh, our poop thats what! I've been holding in crap for almost three days now, how about we put it all to good use!"
Snorty seemed to like the thought. "Ha! I like the idea! How should we do it?"
Tran shrugged. "Beats me, use your imagination! Can't be to hard to rain on the parades of all these people, come up with somthing!"
The other elephants started to look excited, more and more of them coming around to the idea of causing mayhem. "Hell, lets do it!" Exclaimed Harwin.
"Hey, maybe if we're really lucky, we can close this stinking prison down!" Added Davis.
"Amen!" Shouted all five of the elephants.
Tran nodded, glad they supported his plan. "Alright, here's how we do this. They are going to put us into our pens in a few minutes, but after that, they are having that HUGE show with that moron of a magician over on the other side of the grounds. With the rest of the park being almost empty, you guys can walk about, pretending your in some kind of parade, and then do your worst!"
"Wait, what about you?" Asked Davis. "You're sitting out?"
Tran nodded sadly. "Someone has to make sure nobody comes in. If anyone does, i'll hit the intercom with my trunk and you all better start running on back over here!"
Though slightly dissapointed about one of their own being left behind, the other elephants agreed and shuffled off towards their pens. The five obendiently went into thier stalls and waited for the bell that signaled the beginning of the magicians show.
"Showtime!" Tran said softly, causing snickers amongst his compatriots.
With practiced efficiency, Tran used his trunk to steal the keys off the board in front of his large cage. Like a fool, the handler always left his keys in the same spot, on the pin-up board across from Trans cage. It took tran but a second to snach the keys, afterwhich he unlocked his cage and then tossed the keys to his brothers.
"Have fun guys!"
123.title: Poop near and/or on the tourists

choices: Talk to some of the other gators
13.content:
Two green and blue scaled alligators were walking along a swamp in the morning conversating with each other. One of their names was Garet and the other one was named Baron. Garet was having some problems at the moment, mostly because his current girlfriend just broke up with him. And the alligators had a feeling that mating season was coming soon.
"Hey man, can I ask you something?" asked Garet.
"Sure, why not?" responded Baron.
"Does my breath stink? I mean, a lot of gators have been walking around spreading rumors that it smells like rotten meat and dirty gym socks."
"...Not exactly--" muttered Baron meekly.
"It stinks don't it?"
"Like a fuckin' skunk after it's rolled around in bull shit!"
Garet exhaled loudly and sniffed the air, groaning loudly afterwards.
"Man! It does stink!"
"I told you."
"I don't get it! Every goddamn alligator I've met, that includes you Baron, has nasty alligator breath! Yours smells worse than mine!"
"Yeah, but I'm the one who bangs my girlfriend everynight before I go to sleep." said Baron, smiling.
"Fuck you. If those humans made toothpaste for alligators, I'd gladly brush my teeth everyday."
"You can't pick up a toothbrush."
"SHUT UP BARON!!"

Later that day, Garet and Baron, as well as another group of gators were resting and cooling off near this tiny lake. Actually, it was more of a dirty pool of water that the alligators bathed in.
"So, does anybody got any news to share?" asked a gator named Rex.
"Garet's girlfriend broke up with him cause he's got bad breath."
Garet growled angrily and snapped at Baron, biting him on the tail.
"OW! What the fuck was that for?!"
"You weren't supposed to tell anyone jackass!"
Some of the alligators laughed and snickered audible enough for Garet to hear.
"Hey! All you bastards got funky gator breath too, so I don't know why you guys are laughing!"
"Y'know, now that you mention it, that doesn't make sense. I mean, my breath has literally managed to kill a flower; Garet's just smells like gym socks." said Arnold, a brown alligator.
"Maybe you should mate with an alligator whose breath is worse than yours. That's what I do!" said Rex.
Arnold sighed heavily and limped over to the pool of water, where he began to cool off.
"Are you serious Rex? How do you stand that?!" asked Baron.
"Easy. Every morning I bury my nose in leaves so I can't smell anything. Besides, I like to play around with my girlfriend, like farting while we're having sex."
"...Maybe I'll just find another mate. I hear some crocodiles are getting imported by some poachers!" said Garet.
"Yeah. In the meantime, let's go cool off in the bath." said Baron.
Just as a couple of gators were about to enter the pool, they heard Arnold pass gas loudly before they saw the water gradually turn a dark brown. It also began to stink a lot more than usual. The gators realized what Arnold just did and quickly ran out the pool, leaving Arnold to bathe in his own filth.
"Dude, you're sick! You just took a shit in the pool!" shouted Rex.
"No I didn't!"
"You've been shitting like crazy for the past four days and yesterday, you told me you got diarrhea!"
"...Okay, I took a dump in the pool." laughed Arnold.

"So, what should we do now Baron?" asked Garet.
13.title: Scales 'n' Halitosis

choices: Garet and Baron go chat with the crocodiles
133.content:
"Maybe we should get back at Arnold for taking a dump in the pool." Baron snickered.
"Yeah...maybe we'll be the ones who get the dump on him instead!" Garet laughed.
So Garet and Baron observed the brown alligator for a while, watching him walk around the swamp talking with some of the other gators, before resting in the sand and yawning to cool himself off. His large mouth was wide open, which left them the opportunity to attack.
"Okay! Let's do this!" Baron shouted.
Garet walked up to Arnold with his tail next to his face and waited for Baron to step on his tail. Arnold was so unconscious that he barely even stirred and Garet had the perfect opportunity to play one of the best pranks ever.
"Good thing I ate that antelope before we did this eh Baron?"
Garet lifted up his tail and farted into Arnold's mouth just as he began to yawn. And what was funny about the whole thing is that he didn't even wake back up; he just continued to yawn.
"This is just too damn funny! Do it again!" said Baron.
And so, Garet farted into his mouth once again. Only this time, Arnold shut his mouth and said in a drowsy tone, "Mmmm...eggs..."
Garet and Baron couldn't help but roll over and laugh loud enough to wake up Arnold, who was puzzled to see the two of them lying there like that.
"What's so funny?"
"GOTCHA!!"
"What do you mean you got me?!"
"I just farted in your mouth while you were sleeping!" laughed Garet.
"Whuh?"
Arnold smacked his jaws again and the taste of eggs suddenly became fetid and tasted bitter.
"OH, MAN! That's disgusting--you farted in my mouth?!"
"You asked for it. Next time, don't shit in the pool unless no one's in it."
Garet and Baron walked away from the smelly brown gator, laughing their asses off while Arnold stared at the two, contemplating devious thoughts.
133.title: Gassy Mouth

14.content:
On a farm in the old country lived four horses in a small pen. Two were boys and two girls. The two girls names were Mare and Alicey. The two boys were named Bum and Don. The girls and boys didn't really get along though the boys absolutely fell head over hoofs for them. The girls on the other hand preferred more stronger mates then these two horrible excuses for riders. Of course the boys, no matter how bad the girls treated them, still asked them out. At nights the girls usually came over too the boys and tortured them in a messy way. Usually the girls would sit on the boys faces and fart, and other times they would go even further and poop all over there face. The smell woke them up, but even though they saw the girls do that they still asked them out. Though one day the boys seemed too be "plotting" revenge. The girls didn't consider them too be "intelligent" as they were. Still there whispering peeked there interest.
"What do you think they are plotting?" Mare asked Alicey.
"probably wondering how they are gonna hit on us again" Alicey answered.
"They just won't give" Mare says a bit annoyed.
"Boys will be boys" Alicey said sighing.
"I guess" Mare said looking at the two once more.
"are you finally falling for them?" Alicey asked laughing
"I'm gonna make sure they don't do anything too us" Mare said looking back.
"yeah i don't wanna lick shit off my face" Alicey said very sarcastically.
Mare walked too the two, who both saw her coming and smiled.
"well h-" Don began but was cut off by mare
"Save it. what are you too whispering about?" Mare asked commandingly
"I was talking too him about some duck gossip" Bum said smiling.
"You and gossip mix like shit and gems" Mare said angered.
"Hey is genuine rumors and we need too find stuff out since you girls seem too hate us" Don said stepping up.
Mare was actually surprised. Usually the two were wimps but today they seemed more confident.
"Who put the stick up your ass?" Mare asked snorting.
"Wanna get a fart in your face?" Bum asked turning too show his fly attracting rear.
Mare took some steps back and retreated. The boys smiled and laughed a bit too each other.
"They actually stood up" Mare said
Alicey was speechless, but was a bit sarcastic about it, though it was still a surprise.
"give me the info" Alicey said listening in
Mare told her friend all the info, and Alicey smiled
"wow, they seem more attractive already" Alicey said smiling.
"oh hold your horses" Mare said laughing.
"HA....ha" Alicey said way more sarcastic then supposed too be.
It was early in the day so the girls had plenty of time too themselves. Alicey smiled looked at the boys wondering what they would say if she hit on them for a change. Mare felt like cooling down in the mud. Alicey also wanted too gallop in the open field like a maniac. Mare felt like grossing the boys out for fun. It was really up too them what they did for some time. after a bit of arguing Mare and Alicey finally decided
14.title: Pen Pain

choices: Don and Bum still think they're attractive and do nothing
141.content:
"Well, they've been asking to be grossed out, indirectly," said Mare.

"Oh, fine. We'll go with what you want this time, but I get to choose what we do next!" Alicey announced.

"Whatever. So how do you want to go about this?"

"You're the one who wants to gross them out. I'm just following along. So you decide."

"Well..." Mare was thinking. "...whatever that farmer fed us, it left a bad taste in my mouth. And not just my mouth, but my WHOLE digestive tract too. I have a stomach ache right now because of that stuff. I think you get my plan," commented Mare.

Alicey whined, "Oh, geez, isn't that one getting old? I thought you were going to make us pick our noses with tree bark, not make them unattractive!"

"Hey, you said you're following along, so no complaining! Besides, one of them was thinking about farting in my face, so you can blame him for the idea."

A low gurgle was heard coming from Mare's bowels. Something stinky was forming in there.

Alicey spat, "You know, you're not even remotely lady-like."

"...Says the mare who left ten pounds of digested food on one of the boys' face."

"Hey, I couldn't hold it at the time! It's not my fault!"

"And what about all the other times you left 'presents' on their faces?"

"Same reason!"

"Yeah...I'm sure of that..." Mare eyed Alicey with one eye. Seconds later, a much louder gurgle emanated from Alicey's bowels. "Dinner didn't agree with you either?"

"Not really. It never does, either," complained Alicey.

"Well then, let's go get them while we have the chance. Seems to me like those two idiots are already sleeping."

"Whatever. I just need to get this load out of me!"

***A few minutes later***

Bum and Don were sleeping soundly on separate haystacks. Neither of them noticed, but their heads were each between a pair of a mare's hind legs. Alicey was the first of the two mares to start dropping her load. She had so much packed up in her bowels that she could literally feel the crap slide down and out of her anus. Her eyes were squinting from the pain in her rear and her grunting. Mare was doing the same thing, except with much less effort. After about a minute or two, both were done. They moved away and to a safe spot so that they could watch the coming comedy.

Not long after, both of the boys woke up, wondering what it was they were feeling on their faces.

"Ugghhh," moaned Bum. He was still tired. "Is this a...free...Chocolate Sun-...Sundae...?"

Don was stirring around on the ground. He added, "I don't...know...but it tastes like..."

As soon as some of the crap got on their tongues. they both fully woke up, eyes wide and spitting out the brown contents. They then immediately stood up and tried to shake off the rest of the poop.

"Ah, dammit! They got us again! That's it, they both deserved to be farted on," declared Bum.

"Or worse. But they're still attractive," Don said. The two mares heard what they were saying and didn't like it one bit. Well, except for the last part a little bit. Competition was already brewing.
141.title: Gross the boys out

choices: Don and Bum start to poop
Don and Bum decide to butt rape Mare and Alicey
Mare and Alicey bite the inside of their asshole
1411.content:
"Let's strike back!" said Bum.

"Yeah! We'll show 'em how it feels to get farted on!" mumbled Don.

A few hours later after breakfast, Don and Bum had massive gas building in their bellies and were prepared to strike back at the beautiful, but noisome female horses. They had everything planned out perfectly, like it was a giant bank heist.

"Heh heh heh...this is gonna work perfectly!" muttered Bum.

"Yeah! Let's see how it feels when they smell the stinky odor of my ass gas!"

So Don and Bum walked over to Mare and Alicey and walked right up to 'em like it was nothing.

"Hey boys. You gonna try and hit on us again?" joked Mare.

"I don't think so..."

Don and Bum farted loudly right next to the female horses like it was nothing, smiling casually afterwards.

"Ew! You guys stink! And you wonder why we never want to have sex with you guys!" said Alicey.

The horses back up to try and get away from Don and Bum's stinky gas, but they end up getting their hind legs stuck inside a hole and are unable to move.

"URGH!! I can't move Alicey!"

"Me either Mare!"

Don and Bum turned around and pressed their butt on Mare and Alicey's faces, lifting their tails.

"PAYBACK BITCH!!!" yelled Don.

The two horses passed gas loudly in the horses' faces and swatted their tail at them. Then Don sighed heavily and neighed loudly as another humongous fart was squeezed out, which smelt like burnt beans and eggs. Bum on the other hand was farting for a full 30 seconds before he paused...and started farting another 30 seconds.

"Wow, after this, I don't think we can date you guys without wearing nose plugs!" laughed Bum.

"Up yours asshole! You're gonna get it!"

"Oh, I don't think so..." said Don and Bum mischievously.
1411.title: Don and Bum strike back

choices: Don and Bum get the girls back later
Don and Bum still do nothing
Mare and Alicey get the boys again
1412.content:
"Yeah, I guess you're right," murmured Bum. "But still, we need to get them back somehow!"

"No, I don't want their sexyness to be killed."

"Are you really falling for them THAT much?" he complained.

Don spotted the two mares who immediately removed themselves from visibility upon being noticed. He neighed.

"What, you haven't noticed their finely-shaped butts?"

"You mean the ones that almost killed us?"

"Yeah! I me-ean...no! No wait, yeah! No wait a second, no! I...uh...ahhh!" Don struggled. "Even so, they're so...smooth..."

"Exactly, which is why they decided to crap on us while we were sleeping," Bum sneered.

"You know what I mean! I was talking about their bodies," the horse whined. Bum sighed.

"Whatever. Well I have no 'revenge gas' in me, so I can't get them back. I'll probably date one of them later on."
1412.title: Don and Bum still think they're attractive ...

144.content:
"I think we should run around in the field. At least we'll catch some good wind," Alicey suggested.

"Well, I guess," Mare mumbled. She was sighing. "But next time, I get to choose."

"Fair. Now come on! Catch me, Ms. Nolegs!"

"What's that supposed to mean?!"

"It means you're too slow for your own good," taunted Alicey. She already had a galloping headstart.

"Grrrrrr..." Mare growled. "You'll be a REAL nolegs if I catch up to you!"

"Yeah, IF you catch up to me!" This irritated Mare greatly.

"Why Youuuuuuuuu...!!!"

Mare immediately took off after Alicey at full speed. The breeze was a powerful one, allowing their manes to sail with the wind as though they were a part of it. Shockingly enough, to Alicey's surprise, Mare was getting close to being neck-and-neck with her. As soon as she noticed this she began to push her legs to their physical limits. And in response, Mare was doing the same. Their competitive natures allowed them to feel a sense of speed completely unfamiliar to them. In the hopes that any depressing feelings would slow Mare down, Alicey threw another taunt.

"Not good enough, Nolegs! And you won't ever be good enough with that weight of yours!"

"Oh don't be pissy about the fact that I'm close to you!" (No, not sexually)

"Just be happy that you're having good luck today!"

"Good luck?!" Mare was insulted. "Whatever. I'll be letting you know what good luck you're going to need!"

Alicey started to slow down as she breathed a bit harder - a lot of oxygen had flown by her. And she began to breathe even harder due to the anger she was feeling because Mare had passed her. Alicey's willpower would never let Mare beat her in a competition, but her body's physical limits would. After a few more minutes of nonstop galloping had passed, Alicey had to stop - she was breathless. Meanwhile, Mare still had it in her to keep going, albeit at a much slower speed.

"Well then, it's pretty obvious who the real 'Nolegs' is, isn't it?" Mare spat.

"Shutup! Like I said, luck was on your side today."

"Yeah, you just wish." Mare turned around and moved towards Alicey. "By the way, you basically said earlier that I was fat."

"Because you are!"

"And that, I don't appreciate!"

"Like I care, FATTY!!!" Things were about to get ugly. Despite what Alicey had been saying about Mare, yes she does have some extra weight on her, but not enough to be considered fat.

"Oooooooooofffffff!" Mare stomped her front hooves hard. "Girl, you just REALLY want to see my bad side!"

Bum and Don were watching the two girls go at it with colorful language. Both of them were chewing their hay slowly with their eyes wide. Neither of them new that females had it in them to sound so sinister.

"Sexy as always," Don mentioned.

Bum followed up, "Mmmhmmmm..."

They both swallowed their hay at the same time.
144.title: run in the feild

choices: Don and Bum have a flashback
Don and Bum go do something else
1441.content:
"How often do they do this?" Don asked.

"Dunno. It's the first time I've ever seen them this competitive." Bum reached his head down again to start chewing on more hay. As the duo continued to watch the girls, they could see a small lightning bolt between their heads as they stared each other down. The colorful words continued to sprout their wings.

"You wanna keep watching them? I'm getting kind of bored here," Don complained.

"Yeah. Looks like it's just getting interesting." Both the girls were neighing and rearing up their front legs. It didn't seem as if combat would be far off. That was until the farm owner saw what was happening and came rushing out. Mare and Alicey have had intense situations with each other before, so the farmer knew how to deal with the mares. If they ever got out of control, sometimes he would resort to more painful means.

"HEY, CUT IT OUT!!!" the farmer's voice boomed. Everything around him became silent after he yelled. Even Mare and Alicey stopped what they were doing to turn their heads towards him.

"Too bad," said Bum. "He always has to ruin the entertainment. I still won't forget the time when we tried to make out with those two girls a long time ago, and then he came out here and punished us.

"Yeah, tell me about it."
1441.title: Continue from the boys' perspectives

15.content: First four don't suit you? Try some of these...
15.title: More...

151.content:
In a small forest where lots of animals resided were two skunks. one was Calvin and the other Daila. Calvin was a male and Daila a female, both good friends though they pissed each other off often. Both of them were sorta just talking after hunting season and aftermath. Though Calvin was bored from just talk and wanted too do something besides fall asleep from an endless conversation. Though Daila was content on having too just talk, and all she wanted too do though she knew right away Calvin was gonna just doze right off. She usually let him and figured she would sleep nearby but this time she didn't feel like boring Calvin too sleep.
"Alright I'll shut up" Daila says sighing
"thank god" Calvin said a little too loud.
"Hey watch it" Daila said angered.
"Don't blow a gasket" Calvin said sighing
"maybe i will on your face" She growled back
"Do it and I'll make sure your buried in rhino shit" Calvin threatened.
"You love me too much too do that" Daila said laughing
Though it didn't really acer to Calvin till just now. Truthfully he did love Daila a lot more then she knew. He was about too speak up but he kept his mouth shut.
"Haha!" Daila said giggling a little.
"Ah shut it" Calvin said moaning a little.
"Bored?" Daila asked rather stupidly
"What do you think smart ass?" Calvin said laying down.
"well what do you want too do?" Daila asked laying down beside him
"I have no fucking clue" Calvin said moaning more.
"come up with something, even an idiot like you can do it" Daila said laughing a bit.
"your so smart do it yourself" Calvin said laying down with his face tucked in his tail.
Daila heard Calvin snort a bit, meaning he was falling asleep. Now Daila could do what she liked and Calvin would not even know it. She smiled and raised her tail over Calvin's face. She then did what a skunk did best and blasted a powerful stink into his face. Once Calvin breathed in he woke up and coughed.
"Daila!" He shouted covering his nose with his paws.
"I thought you liked girl farts" Daila said laughing.
"Not on me!" Calvin said stepping back.
But unfortunately Calvin stepped back and slipped falling. He and Daila were in there small hole in the oldest oak in the forest. He stepped back into the opening and fell down a good distance from the ground. Though what he landed on was actually soft. He took a good look around and realized what he landed on.
151.title: Well This Stinks

1512.content:
Calvin landed in a nice, soft, stinky pile of elephant shit. as soon as he looked around he jumped out of the pile and brushed himself off. Most of the stuff came of though there was a little brown on his tail. He spit constantly and ran around disgusted. Daila ran down the tree laughing at Calvin and making sure not too land in the soft pile. She laughed a little before finally being able too speak.
"Thats a good look for you" She said almost bursting out with laughter.
"Water, i need water" Calvin said huffing from wearing himself out.
"there is a pond near by, though if there is elephant dung, i am guessing elephants are near by" Daila said feeling a bit sorry for Calvin.
"Take me!" Calvin pleaded.
"Hold your water, we will get there" Daila said huffing.
"I need too get there now!" Calvin said very angered.
"alright!" Daila said making a run for the lake.
Calvin ran after Daila though much slower since he was out of breath already. Finally, they arrived at the pond and Calvin jumped right in. He started too bathe himself, but then an elephant picked him uo.
"What are you doing in our pond?" The elephant asked Calvin.
"I fell in a pile of your shit" Calvin said terrified.
"And your washing off in our pond?" the elephant asked more angered.
"Its her fault" Calvin said pointing at Daila.
"Sure it is" the elephant said sarcastically.
"If she didn't fart in my face, then i would not have fallen" Calvin said defensibly.
"Regardless, you must do us a favor for using our pond" the elephant said
"Wait don't punish him, punish me" Daila said stepping up.
"I'll punish you both" The elephant said smiling.
"Wait please" Calvin said trying too plead his way out of trouble.
"Let me see..." the elephant thought smiling more
1512.title: A "Crappy" day

15121.content:
"You have to clean my butt!"
"Bullshit!" shouted Calvin.
"No, it's elephant shit and it's spread all over my ass! So clean it off!"
"But--what about Daila?! She started this!"
"What? Oh, you go get me some bananas and peanuts; I'm gettin' kinda hungry."
"Okay." said Daila.
"WHAT?! She gets to collect bananas and I have to clean your fat ass?!" whined Calvin.
The elephant turned around and reveal his grotesque gray butt covered in dried up elephant dung, with flies buzzing around it. Even worse, the elephant started to squirt out a few bubbly farts in Calvin's face, causing him to groan.
"Don't be afraid to go inside the hole. I want it squeaky clean!"
Calvin shuddered and moaned loudly, running across the dead leaves to get a stick off the ground. He picked up the stick with his mouth and raised it to the elephant's rear end, rubbing the stick back and forth, scraping off the excrement. The elephant sighed contently.
"Thanks man! My ass has been itching all day!"
The elephant then farted upon Calvin's face real loudly, blasting stinky hot gas into his eyes, causing them to burn.
"Oops. Excuse me."
"Shut up! You did that on purpose!"
"Yeah, but this is an accident."
The elephant lowered his rear to the ground and sat on Calvin, wiggling his butt all over the place. When the elephant stood back up, Calvin's body was shoved halfway up his butt.
"This isn't gonna end well..."

"Hey, where's Calvin?" asked Daila, returning.
"Um...he's stuck. I think you gotta pull him out." laughed the elephant.
Daila sighed heavily when he looked into the elephant's butt and saw Calvin's tail wiggling like crazy, wanting to get free. She bit down hard on Calvin's tail and pulled her body back, eventually yanking Calvin's body out the elephant's ass. Calvin gasped loudly and started screaming and shaking like crazy, getting the dung all over Daila.
"What the hell Calvin?!"
The elephant started eating the bananas and peanuts that Daila got for him and began to walk away.
"Thanks guys! You've been a great help!"
The elephant blasted one last fart before departing, causing Daila and Calvin to groan with disgust again.
"Sorry!" shouted the elephant.

"So...what should we do now? I'm pretty sure you don't want to sleep anymore."
"Well, my dad wanted to see me today for errand, but my other friend, Lyle the porcupine, wanted to show me something important. I guess we could..."
15121.title: Scrub a dub Stink

151211.content:
"Go see my dad." said Calvin.
Daila sighed. "Watch, he's gonna make us do a bunch of chores again."
"Hey, he's my Dad. What am I supposed to do?"
Calvin and Daila walked back up the tree bark and re-entered the hole that was their home. Only, when they got inside, a horrible stench entered their noses.
"UGH!! What the hell is that smell?!" asked Daila.
"Oh, that's not you? I thought you farted again." sneered Calvin.
"Shut up."
The two skunks turned a corner and saw Calvin's father grunting and defecating in the back of their home.
"Hey! What'd I tell you about me and when I take a shit?!"
Calvin sighed and rolled his eyes. "Never 'interrupt' you during bowel movements."
"Exactly."
Calvin's father sighed and grunted again, releasing another lump of skunk poop.
"Alright, since you're already here, I got some chores--"
Daila and Calvin moaned exasperatedly and rolled their eyes.
"Hey, someone's gotta do it."
"Just shut up and tell us what we gotta do. Hopefully I don't have to clean another elephant's ass." said Calvin.
"What?"
"Nothing pop."
"Well, Daila's mom told me she wants her to wash this tiger and pull a thorn out of a sloth's foot."
"That doesn't sound too bad." said Daila.
"And Son, I want you to lick the toe-jam off this lemur's foot and find some jewel located in a pile of rhino dung."
"What the hell!?!!? Why does Daila always get the easy stuff to do?!!? This is so unfair!" screamed Calvin.
"See ya Calvin!" said Daila, running out the tree.
151211.title: Chores, chores, and more chores

1512112.content:
Daila turned around the corner to go to where the tiger and sloth were waiting. She found the two animals sitting in a small patch of grass. As soon as she got close, the stench from the tiger hit her nose and made her hold it. That's quite something, considering she's a skunk.

"Oh my god, what did you roll around in?!" Daila asked. The tiger hung his head low.

"Nothing. I just haven't bathed myself in a week since my tongue is hurting!" the striped animal complained. When he was hungry a few days ago, he smelled something in a bush: an antelope's body. However, there was also a porcupine in it, so when he tried to bite the antelope's body and drag it out, he...well...missed.

"We can tell," the sloth jumped in. "Heck, it's been horrible having to wait here next to you!" That hit a nerve in the tiger.

"Would you shut up you little maggot," the tiger roared, forcing its head to only an inch away from the sloth's eyes. "You know, if I wanted to-"

"Hey, hey, hey! Calm down," the skunk ordered. "Anyway, which of you two was here first, so I know where to start?"
1512112.title: Switch to Daila's POV

151212.content:
"Lets go see what Lyle wants." Daila said after thinking.
"Where is she?" Calvin asked, shaking a bit.
"She lives by the mud pits, they are not far from here." Daila says smiling.
"Mud pits? Sure it's not poop?" Calvin asked, disturbed by cleaning the elephant.
"Not poop, no smell." Daila said sighing.
"I just don't want to deal with poop for a long time." Calvin said.
Daila and Calvin both made way to the mud pits where Lyle was. Though it was not that long of a walk, Calvin was slow while trying to shake poop off that he thought was still on him. Daila kept saying he was clean, but Calvin didn't trust her. After about an hour of slow walking they arrived. Lyle was right in the front of one smiling as she saw Daila.
"Daila!" Lyle shouted running too Daila.
"Wait!" Daila shouted before she was tackled.
"Gotcha!" Lyle said landing on Daila laughing.
Daila shoved Lyle off, and they both hugged before Daila introduced Calvin. Lyle smiled and laughed a little.
"Daila you got a cute one for sure." Lyle said smiling.
Calvin and Daila both blushed deeply. Calvin smiled and Daila laughed.
"We are friends, not mates!" Daila replies smiling.
Calvin didn't answer.
"So what did you want me for?" Daila asked Lyle.
"I need too get back at the bully Kim." Lyle said sighing.
"That large porcupine that teases you a lot?" Daila asked looking at her.
"Yeah, I have an awesome idea..." Lyle said smiling.
"I need you and Calvin for this. We are gonna poop in the mud pit Kim likes to lounge in." Lyle said.
"Awesome!" Daila said smiling more.
"Alright, follow me." Lyle said smiling and leading the way.
"Calvin you coming?" Daila asked looking back.
151212.title: Lyle, Calvin, Daila, and mud

choices: She doesn't notice the smell and gets in.
Kim smells the poop and doesn't get in.
1512121.content:
"Yeah, I am." Calvin answers. Together, the three animals make their way to the mud pit that Kim likes coming to.

"Okay, here it is. Are you guys ready?" Lyle asked.

"Yep." Daila answered.

"This is gonna be good." Calvin said.

Both skunks and the porcupine held their behinds over the mud pit and relaxed their bowels. At first, they farted over the pit filling the air with a foul-smelling gas. They let out a couple more farts before they began to really empty their bowels into the mud. Calvin and Daila were dropping turds into the mud. Daila also used her scent glands to add a bit of skunk oil to her dung, adding an extra stink to her waste. Calvin didn't really think to do so until he smelled the poop coming from Daila and added his own musk to the mix. Lyle mean while was pooping a liquid stream of diherrea into the mud. A mixture of relief and mischeviousness was going through his mind as he defecated into the mud. After a few minutes, all three of them were done and couldn't help but see and smell what they just did. Since the mud and the scat were both brown, it was hard to tell what happened by simply looking. But the smell was completely different. The three of them could clearly smell the dung mixed in with the mud, not to mention the skunk musk.

"This is great." Lyle said, holding back laughter. "When she gets in this, it's..."

"Finally, I'm here." A female voice said. The three of you recongized it as Kim.

"She's here! Hide!" Lyle whispered. The three of you hid behind a nearby rock and looked from behind it as Kim the porcupine approach the defiled mud pit.
1512121.title: Brown mess

15122.content: "Now you must go get me some food, bananas, perphaps." the elephant said. "We-well what about Dahlia?" Calvin asked. "She'll clean my ass. My butt's been itchy all week!" he answered. "What?! He just gets you food but I have to clean your big, crappy ass?!" Dahlia shouted. "Well, you were the cause after all" the elephant answered. Calvin sighed and Dahlia groaned.
15122.title: "You must get me some bananas"

152.content:
There was two walruses. One was named Bruce, and one was named Josh. They were hanging out on an iceberg when Bruce spoke up, "Dude, I'm hungry, let's go eat some fish!" "Okay, let's go!" Josh replied.

Bruce jumped into the water first with a large splash, followed by Josh, with a smaller splash. A large bubble rose up from behind Bruce, and popped, releasing a foul smell. "Gross Bruce did you just fart?" asked Josh. "No!" Bruce said. "Whatever let's go catch some fish!"

Josh caught and ate five fish, while Bruce caught and ate seven. They got to the shore and lay down. Bruce's gut rumbled quietly, but audible. "You can't STILL be hungry!" sighed Josh. "I'm not hungry, I actually feel really full." Bruce said and groaned. He rolled onto his stomach putting pressure on it by accident, releasing a small fart. "Bruce!" Josh yelled. "I'm sorry I was really trying to hold it in!" Bruce pleaded.
152.title: Walrus Beginning

155.content: Here's the last one, plus two more options if the nine selected animals don't suit your taste.
155.title: Even more...

choices: The lionesses dump him in the lions' territory
1552.content:
In the midst of the Amazon Rainforest were a large colony of female lions who patrolled the area and rules half the forest with an iron fist. The other half of the forest was ruled by the lions and other kinds of animals in that genre. Many of these lions were large, almost the size of an SUV or a bus even due to some genetic defect. The Amazon lionesses were a lot more intimidating than the other lionesses and took their orders from their leader, who was currently residing back inside their lair. Right now, a couple of the lionesses were walking through the thick jungle looking for any anomalies that occurred.
"Hey, when was the last time someone searched the caves for any rubies?"
"I hear all the caves were full of dormant volcanoes that could spring into action at any moment."
"Which is why we should find the rubies before they get fried into dust!"
"Meh. If I were you Shawna, I'd just leave them alone. The last thing we need is to have is someone--"
"What the..."
One of the giant female lions sniffed the air several times before trotting through thick brush. The lioness looked through a set of ferns and saw a human being sleeping next to a tree. By the looks of his clothing and how worn out they were, he must've been a tourist who got lost inside the forest. Either way, the human was invading their land without permission.
"What's a human doing in OUR forest?!?!"
The rest of the lionesses spotted the human being and started growling and sniffing him, licking their maws and lifting their paws to lash the man's face off.
"All trespassers must be punished by death!!"
"I thought the trespassers get pooped and farted on?"
"No, those are the lions."
"I'm pretty sure it's the humans."
"No, if we find a human, we capture them and hand them over to the lions so they can do the dirty work."
"But that doesn't seem like fun! It's been a while since I've peed on someone and I gotta use the bathroom real bad!"
The leader of the lioness group sigh exasperatedly.

"Okay, let's take a vote: We can either mark the human with our poop and urine or drag him over to the lions and let them deal with him."
1552.title: The Amazon Lionesses

15521.content:
Everyone took a vote and in the end, it ended with the majority of the lionesses voting to mark the human being with their poop and piss.
"Okay, majority rules: We're gonna mark him!"
"Cool. It's been a while ever since I marked a human being."
"You girls know the drill. Just relax your bowels and let the anus do the rest."
"Right."
And so, all the female lions turned around and backed over to the human resting next to the tree, loosening their bowels and letting some poop travel to the rectum. They all wiggled their hips and squatted over the human, spreading their legs to let the poop flow out smoothly and easier than before. All of them sighed briefly before farting loudly and emitting fetid, sour gas from their asses. They farted for five seconds before they stopped and the shit hit the fan...or in this case, the human. The first lionesses squeezed out a large concentration of poop from her ass and simultaneously began to urinate on the human, dousing his shirt with urine scented shit. The second lionesses, Shawna, had a bad case of diarrhea and was busy squirting liquid poo on his pants. The poop splashed everywhere and dripped all the way down to the human's legs, making his whole body stink. The leader of the lionesses was constipated and was having trouble taking a dump.
"Remember, just think about waterfalls."
"Oh, yeah."
The leader shut her eyes and daydreamnt about rushing, beautiful waterfalls, which widened her bladder and anus enough to let out a catastrophic amount of warm piss and chunky poo all over the human's head. She farted twice as she peed and leaned over a bit to ease out some more shit. The smell was horrible and one of the lionesses thought about covering her nose if she could plug it with her paw.
"Wow, you must've had a mighty storm brewin' in your colon!"
The leader responded by farting out another heaping loud of shit.

As the lionesses were busy pooping on the human...
15521.title: Stinky markers

choices: Let him join in and mark the human with the Leader
Let him join...but only if he agrees to let them mark him too
155211.content: As the lionesses continued to mark the unfortunate guy, a gorgeous and muscular make tiger catches a glimpse of the action. "*hehehe* looks like a marking mania over here" said the tiger before getting a whiff of the odors "Uuf...Sure smells like one too". Despite the odor, the tiger just kept focusing on the lioness' smooth, gorgeous bodies as he approached them. "Good evening" said the tiger seductively "My poor bladder and bowels are aching...*tail flick*...and since the restroom is already here, hows about I add a little more stink...*ploot*...to this party". The lionesses relized that the tiger was also invading their territory, but he was offering to help them so...
155211.title: Here comes the male...

choices: Now it's the tiger's turn to get marked.
They notice something unusual about the tiger's scent.
1552112.content:
"Sure you can join in." The leader of the lionesses says. "But on one condition. Since you're invading our territory as well, we get to mark you too."

'Didn't think about that much.' The tiger thought to himself.

"I still have enough dung and urine to mark him. What about you?" The leader asks the other two.

"I've still got plenty of scat left." One says.

"I have enough pee to leave my scent on him." The other replies.

The tiger takes than as a 'yes' and joins in. He came forward turned his behind to the already- messy human, and relaxed his bowels. He started pooping on the human's chest, dropping smelly clups of tiger scat mixing in with the lion scat. Before long, the lionesses stop, saving what was left for the tiger. As the tiger finished pooping, he moved his behind around, getting some of his dung on the man's head, legs, and shoes. After letting out a huge fart, he started peeing. Again, he moved around some, spraying the man with as urine as he could get on him, leaving a distinct male tiger scent among the female lion smells.
1552112.title: Leaving his mark

info.brief_description: A hilarious comedy about the lives of animals.
info.description:
Okay, this is basically like Farce of The Penguins, but instead, it involves several different animals going through different comical situations. Frankly, I'm sick and tired of all those vores and other weird stories, so I'm making my own non-vore simply funny IN story with tons of toilet humor. Rated 18+ for massive language, sexual situations, crude humor, and violence.

Rules:

1.Yes, sex is okay since they're animals, but don't make the WHOLE thing just about sex.
2. All animals can't walk like humans and look just like everyday animals.
3. Animals talk to each other ONLY. Humans can't understand them whatsoever
4. Swearing is aloud. Yep...this is my first story where I'll allow massive language.
5. This is NOT a vore, so if a human does get eaten, don't describe it by every single detail.
6. This is a comedy, not a horror or drama or any of that other crap. Just comedy.
7. Only minor characters can die, so don't kill off the main animal characters.
8. I got no problem with massive fart jokes, poop and pee jokes, smelly feet or bad breath. Use them as much as you want, but try not to make any foot fetishis; I just want it to be funny.
9. No mythical creature like dragons or unicorns, blah, blah, blah. Only use modern day animals.
10. You can change the perspective of animals if you want to. For instance, if you want the story to veer from an alligator to a cat or some other animal, that's okay.
11. Don't end each storyline after two or three chapters. Try to make it long and have a thick plot.
12. No gay/lesbian, transexual or any of that other stuff.

All right, that's about it. I'll think up more later if I need to, and I might change the rating, depenging on which way this story goes. If you don't know if you should add a chapter or not, e-mail me first.

I may offer GPs to anyone who writes additions that are good and funny enough.
